title: Glasgow
desc: Discover Glasgow's amazing visitor attractions, tours and trails, outdoor activities and more as you plan your visit to the city.

title: Manchester
desc: Whether you’re seeking culture, nightlife, history, or just good fun, there are plenty of things to do in Manchester.

title: London
desc: Welcome to London! Discover the best of London with Visit London, the official guide to England’s exciting capital. Find things to do in London, from iconic sightseeing spots and fun-filled days out to top restaurants, theatre and unmissable London events.
